subject: The Internet Patrol - Yahoo Maps Updated with New Features, New Look
body:
The Internet Patrol

Yahoo Maps Updated with New Features, New Look - 2007-06-18 11:05:37-04



The popular Yahoo maps service got a facelift a few weeks ago, as the maps Yahoo offers were ported to a spiffy new platform, offering more features and a new look.  New features enjoyed by the Yahoo maps system include the ability to get driving directions within 34 countries in Europe, terrain overlays, and enhanced printing capabilities.
